pkgmetadata.longdescription:
MyLibrary is a combination of wiki-style notes and file collection.
Features:
1. Server-less wiki-like notes. 2. Simple tags to render note (<b>>,<>i>,<link>...). 3. Drag and drop to add files and links. 4. Search on file attributes and meta-file in the library. 5. Smart folder to collect notes by criterions. 6. Content search by namazu
